sense.def:
To render
pomeni povzročiti, da se lastnost ali stanje osebe ali stvari spremeni. Na primer,
to render something harmless
pomeni, da zaradi našega dejanja nekaj postane neškodljivo ali nenevarno.

seg.quote: Frank was rendered speechless by her reply.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
PREP
‘to’

sense.def:
To render someone help or assistance
pomeni nekomu priskočiti na pomoč.

seg.quote: Dr Lister Smith rendered vital first aid to Commander Bond.
